articles.title: Hostel startup Zostel claims victory in 3-year battle, but OYO denies claim - YourStory
articles.description: Hostel startup Zostel says it has won against OYO, but the hospitality unicorn has refuted these claims categorically, stating that the Arbitration Tribunal has granted no specific relief to Zostel in terms of receiving ownership in OYO.

articles.title: Gold prices today fall again, down ₹11,500 from record highs, silver rises - Mint
articles.description: Gold prices have fallen sharply this year, hurt by optimism over a robust economic recovery and faster than anticipated rises in bond yields
